title: What is the meaning of the song Leave The City by Twenty One Pilots? - Quora

response.answer_text: Leave the City is about leaving the city of Dema. Dema is representative of depression, or mental illness, and is where the story of Trench takes place. The story is pretty complex, and I dont keep up with it much but you can google it and look at twitter and reddit. There’s a megathread of reddit explaining it in detail and lots of useful information and theories about it on twitter.

The city they are referring to is DEMA, which is the city in Nico and the Niners. Supposedly DEMA is depression, and other mental health issues. So Tyler is saying hes going to escape depression one day, but for now hes just trying to survive. If you go watch the video for Nico and the Niners, you will see DEMA and other secrets.
